sentences.english: Some go even further to beat the heat, rolling up their pants legs.
sentences.chinese: 有些人为了祛暑甚至过而无不及，竟卷起裤腿来。

sentences.english: You should get your missus to put a flounce on them.
sentences.chinese: 你应当让你的太太给裤腿加上荷叶边。

sentences.english: Iron the fly area of the pants, then the seams and hem of the first leg.
sentences.chinese: 熨好门襟部分，然后再熨一条裤腿上的裤边和裤脚。

sentences.english: Cut the legs off your jeans and cut them open along the inside seam. Lay them flat on the table.
sentences.chinese: 将牛仔裤的裤腿剪下，沿裤缝线剪开，平放在桌子上。

sentences.english: She ran off the bus to the rock and tugged on the man’s pants.
sentences.chinese: 她跑下车，跑到大石头那里，拉了拉那人的裤腿。

sentences.english: As I arrived at the ford in the river, I pulled up my pant legs and prepared to cross.
sentences.chinese: 我来到河的浅滩处，挽起裤腿，预备趟过去。

sentences.english: In any case, the job of a pleat is to maintain that crease sown the front of your pants.
sentences.chinese: 在任何场合中，裤褶的作用是保持裤腿前面的折痕。

sentences.english: Using the pattern, cut one sole piece and one upper piece from one of the legs. Worn denim has many colour variations.
sentences.chinese: 利用模板从一条裤腿上剪出鞋底和鞋面部分。

sentences.english: Sleeves and trouser legs can be removed in hot weather.
sentences.chinese: 袖子和裤腿在天气炎热时可以取下。

sentences.english: You should get your missus to put a flounce on them.
sentences.chinese: 你应当让你的太太给裤腿加上荷叶边”。

sentences.english: His trousers come to his shoe tops.
Repeat this step on the other pant leg.
sentences.chinese: 重复这样的方法熨好另一条裤腿。

sentences.english: Remove your pants, fill them with air, then tie off the legs.
sentences.chinese: 脱下裤子，充满空气，系好裤腿的两头。

sentences.english: He ripped off his pants' legs to the knees and bound them about his feet.
sentences.chinese: 他齐膝撕下两截裤腿，用他们把脚团团包好。

sentences.english: She has taken up the legs of the trousers.

definition: collar/neckband/neckline/the place where the two ends of a collar meet
